topic.title: MacOS Sierre 10.12 - ZeroNet.app won't open - command-line online
topic.body: Nothing happens. I get the dialogue asking if I will allow something downloaded from the internet to run, I click 'open' and then nothing ever happens. I was finally able to run it from the command-line

1604065491_mirrored_hrdwdmrbl_github.body: Yeah, that actually works. It opens a terminal window which does then cause the ZeroNet page to be loaded in the default browser.
